name: Bayonetta & Vanquish 10th Anniversary Bundle
description:
Bayonetta & Vanquish 10th Anniversary Bundle is an action game developed by Platinum Games. It came out on 18-02-2020. It was published by SEGA. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
Bayonetta & Vanquish 10th Anniversary Bundle is available on Xbox One and PlayStation 4. The game is sold via PlayStation Store and Xbox Store.
